main event: Willis Hanson observed 2 objects weaving erratically in the Fla-S-C--Ga area on July 15, 1959, one of which passed over a basketball with a blue streak tail.
interesting points: The objects were observed visually and on radar,The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The objects were described as being about the size of a dime,One object was noted to have a blue streak tail,The observer described the behavior of the objects as similar to missiles.
sighted object: two objects weaving erratically with a blue streak tail
